### API Reference

# Configuration

## Configuration options reference

Complete reference for all configuration options available in your project.

### Site configuration

Options for the main site.yml file:

- name (string): The name of your documentation site
- description (string): Site description for SEO
- theme (object): Theme customization options

### Build configuration

Options that control the build process:

- prerender (boolean): Enable static site generation
- baseUrl (string): Base URL for deployment

### Theme configuration

Options for customizing the theme:

- primary (string): Primary brand color
- font (string): Font family for body text
